title: Hasselback pear tart
ingredients: ['1 sheet frozen puff pastry - thawed and lightly rolled', '2 Williams pears, halved and cored', '2 Anjou pears, halved and cored', '1 red pear, halved and cored', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '115g cream cheese', '65g icing sugar', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon demerara or raw sugar']
